title: PET/CT imaging agent shows promise for better diagnosis of acute venous thromboembolism

title_detail.value: PET/CT imaging agent shows promise for better diagnosis of acute venous thromboembolism

summary: Researchers report that a new nuclear medicine tracer may allow better diagnosis of acute venous thromboembolism (VTE). Acute VTE is a disease that includes deep-vein thrombosis and its complication, pulmonary embolism, which can be fatal.
